page.title: 11CHURCHES IN LYME REGIS
page.content: In the year 1985 there are three churches and one chapel in Lyme Regis. The Parish church of Lyme Regis is dedicated to St Michael the Archangel. It consists of a nave and baptistry. Also there is a tower of eight bells. One of the windows is dedicated to Mary Anning. The Catholic Church is of St Michael and St George. The altar is made of stone, and there is a series of stone carved pictures of the crucifixion, also a gallery. The Baptist church is mostly wood and has a gallery under the pulpit. The Bethany Chapel is the newest and smallest church.
